type="String"/> <sourceCode language="Fuego2">
if (this.tr_bus_status=="G" and this.tr_ctl_status=="G" and aTR_BUS_STATUS != "G") then // Business revier is changing a cleared deal to non cleared. So trigger re-review this.tr_rereview_req = "Y" tr_bus_status="" tr_ctl_status="" tr_fatal_conf="" tr_bus_stale="" first_reviewer="" generate AuditEvent using detail = " BusRev Event Occured with status set to"+aTR_BUS_STATUS+" on Cleared" ctl_pend_mins=0 bus_pend_mins=0 this.fatal_pend_mins=0 this.tr_bus_conflict=aTR_BUS_CONFLICT this.bus_condition=aBUS_CONDITION this.bus_stat_update = aBUS_STAT_UPDATE else
this.bus_stat_update = aBUS_STAT_UPDATE this.tr_bus_status=aTR_BUS_STATUS this.tr_bus_conflict=aTR_BUS_CONFLICT this.bus_condition=aBUS_CONDITION this.tr_bus_stale=aTR_BUS_STALE
this.bus_pend_mins=0;
logMessage "#######received aTR_BUS_STATUS="+aTR_BUS_STATUS logMessage "#######received aBUS_STAT_UPDATE="+aBUS_STAT_UPDATE logMessage "#######received first_reviewer="+first_reviewer+" for case id="+case_id if bus_stat_update=="Y" then // statements if (first_reviewer =="") then logMessage "#######received first_reviewer found empty assigning BUS" first_reviewer ="BUS" end if this.tr_bus_status=="G" then // In case user changed a previous fatal conflict back to green tr_fatal_conf = "" end
if this.bus_condition == "Y" then sendMail StaffwareTrueInterfaceService using transactionId = Int.intValue(value : transaction_id), mailType = REVIEW_GROUP_UPDATE_XSL_W_CONDITION elseif this.tr_bus_conflict == "Y" then sendMail StaffwareTrueInterfaceService using transactionId = Int.intValue(value : transaction_id), mailType = REVIEW_GROUP_UPDATE_XSL_W_CONFLICT else sendMail StaffwareTrueInterfaceService using transactionId = Int.intValue(value : transaction_id), mailType = REVIEWER_CTL_NOTIFY_BUS_UPDATE end
end
end // end of main if </sourceCode> <property name="RelayToSupported" value="true"/> </method> <method name="busrevDue" flags="public server expression adaptors"> <outputArgument name="return"
